title: Chinese President Visits Pakistan To Finalize Billion-Dollar Trade Route Plan
teaser: China's President Xi Jinping is in Pakistan to oversee the signing of agreements for a plan that would build $46 billion in infrastructure and energy projects. China aims to create greater land and sea ties with Pakistan in order to strengthen its influence in European and Middle Eastern markets.
